StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetEduca.onHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonId int, @StatusType char(1) = 'E' AS
SELECT COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), CE.SCHOOL_END_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS SCHOOL_END_DATE, CASE WHEN CE.SCHOOL_END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 'COMPLETED' ELSE 'CURRENT' END AS EDUCATION_TYPE, COALESCE(CE.EDUCATION_LEVEL, SPACE(0)) AS EDUCATION_LEVEL, CASE @StatusType WHEN 'O' THEN COALESCE(EL.EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) ELSE SPACE(0) END AS EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION, --- COALESCE(EC.EDUCATION_CODE_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) AS EDUCATION_CODE_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(EC.EDUCATION_CODE_DESCRIPTION + CASE WHEN EC.EDUCATION_CODE IN ('Y', 'Z') THEN ' TIER ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(1), (select dbo.GetTier(EC.EDUCATION_CODE, CE.SCHOOL_END_DATE, @PersonId))) ELSE SPACE(0) END, SPACE(0)) AS EDUCATION_CODE_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(HS.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS HIGHSCHOOL_NAME, COALESCE(CE.VERIFICATION, SPACE(0)) AS VERIFICATION, COALESCE(CE.SCHOOL_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS SCHOOL_CODE, COALESCE(CE.CIVILIAN_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS CIVILIAN_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE, COALESCE(CE.EDUCATION_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS EDUCATION_CODE, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), CE.CURRENT_GPA), SPACE(0)) AS GPA, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), CE.CUMULATIVE_GPA), SPACE(0)) AS CUMULATIVE_GPA, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), CE.CREDIT_HOURS), SPACE(0)) AS CREDIT_HOURS, COALESCE(CE.FULL_TIME_STUDENT, SPACE(0)) AS FULL_TIME_STUDENT, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), CE.PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(1), CE.PROJECTED_TIER), SPACE(0)) AS PROJECTED_TIER FROM CANDIDATE_EDUCATION CE INNER JOIN HIGH_SCHOOL HS ON (CE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND CE.SCHOOL_CODE = HS.SCHOOL_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN EDUCATION_CODE EC ON CE.EDUCATION_CODE = EC.EDUCATION_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN EDUCATION_LEVEL EL ON CE.EDUCATION_LEVEL = EL.EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE --LEFT OUTER JOIN EDUCATION_TIER T ON EC.EDUCATION_CODE = T.EDUCATION_CODE ORDER BY COALESCE(CE.SCHOOL_END_DATE, CE.PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE) DESC
